column1: ##Project Description=Basic Details: 	  Sample Submission ID	234_5308  User	Kawata Manabu  Lab	Lotz  Account Code	(08)RAG049617B(C3-554316)-100.00%  Fee	0.00 USD  Discount	0.00%  Actual Fee	  Quoted Amount	  Expected Date	  Actual Date	  Service Id	 	 	 Project Information:	 Study title	Lotz_0715-2022_MK Sample Type description (e.g. Jurkat cell line: liver tissue)	Chondrocytes and TC28 cells Species	Human 	 Services:	 Please briefly describe what you would like the Genomics Core to do for you	DRUG-seq 	 Samples:	 Number of Samples submitted	76 How many reads per sample are needed?	5 million reads How many reads total for all samples are needed?	380 million reads 	 Additional Information:	 Would you like Genomics Core to prepare your sequencing libraries?	Yes Which kit? (if not sure: Genomics Core will provide this information)	 Would you like the CCBB to provide data analysis?	Yes We highly recommend completing this section in anticipation of future GEO submissions	 Goal of the Project	There are 4 different experiments. Experiment #1) Ad-KLF4 treatment with/without IL1b in human chondrocytes (experiment #1 samples 1 to 32)	 Experiment #2) Mocetinostat treatment in TC28 cells (samples 33 to 40)	 Experiment #3) Mocetinostat treatment with/without IL1b in human chondrocytes (samples 41 to 64)	 Experiment #4) IL1b treatment of human chondrocytes (samples 65 to 76)	 Details of requested bioinformatics analyses	DURG-seq analysis with differentially expressed genes (DEGs) as output.  The analyses to be done are as follows:	 Experiment #1	 1-1) Ad-KLF4_IL(-) vs Ad-EGFP_IL(-)	 1-2) Ad-KLF4_IL(+) vs Ad-EGFP_IL(+)	 1-3) Ad-EGFP_IL(+) vs Ad-EGFP_IL(-)	 	 Experiment #2	 2-1) TC_Tx vs TC_DMSO	 	 Experiment #3	 3-1) Chon_Tx_IL(-) vs Chon_DMSO_IL(-)	 3-2) Chon_Tx_IL(+) vs Chon_DMSO_IL(+)	 3-3) Chon_DMSO_IL(+) vs Chon_DMSO_IL(-)	 	 Experiment #4	 4-1) Chondrocyte_IL1b vs Chondrocyte_Con	 References to closely related work (optional)	PMID: 35534137 (our recent work with you) Would you prefer to receive a bcl files and/or a fastq files?	fastq files 	 Experimental Variables:	 Variable 1	 Variable 2	 Variable 3	 Variable 4	 Variable 5	 Variable 6	 Variable 7
##Analysis Notes=use manually generated samplesheet for this project for demux and downstream analysis.
